RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 54. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 14 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In WeightAllowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMOOCHER unhurried early, closed willingly in the six path through the stretch, made the lead near the sixteenth marker proved best by a narrow margin while fully extended. THE GOSPEL OF MARK trailed for a half while racing widest of all, rallied determinedly through deep stretch in the seven path and just missed. MIXTER JENSEN took the lead nearing the five furlong marker in the six path, drew off before the far turn, set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished. ANIMO ROBERTO failed to menace. PLAYING BALL away alertly, set the pace off the rail in the five path for a little over a quarter mile, chased theleader into the far turn then weakened. LITTLE RONS ROCKET well placed, gave way in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Little Rons Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Smoocher
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly 6path, fully extended,

ENTRY.NAME: Animo Roberto
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Playing Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, chased, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Mixter Jensen
ENTRY.COMMENT: took charge 5/8pole, 6path, shook clear, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: The Gospel of Mark
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, wide trip, dug in late, just missed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MARCH 14. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOLY SAINT broke in front, set all the pace, shook clear in deep stretch under left handed urging and prevailed under brisk handling. QUESTION AUTHORITY pressured the winner three then two wide, inched closer on the turn, dropped back a bit in upper stretch then finished determinedly through the final stages while well clear for second. RULING EMPIRE trailed until deep stretch and passed a tiring rival. PERCENTAGE vied for the lead inside rivals and was through after a half. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS ADDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Percentage
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Ruling Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rival

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Saint
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, held well,

ENTRY.NAME: Question Authority
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3 wide, 6path, inched closer turn, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 14 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERFETTO never far back, rallied three wide to make the lead midway on the far turn, set the balance of the pace and drew off under strong handling. GILES trailed early, loomed boldly four wide nearing the top of the stretch then was no match for winner while well clear for second. BLAME IT ON EDDIE with the second flight, offered a mild bid in the three path into the stretch then leveled off. ALGORIX passed tiring rivals. UNCAPTURED PULSE battled for the lead along the inside into the stretch then gave way. GIZMO JONES failed to menace. SKIDSTREAM vied for the lead inside rivals and was through after a half. KLAATU away alertly, contested the lead into the far turn then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Pulse
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, dueled 2-3wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gizmo Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Skidstream
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Blame It On Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, middle move 3path, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Klaatu
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, dueled 2nd turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Algorix
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Perfetto
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 3 wide 2nd turn, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Giles
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, loomed boldly 4 wide, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 14 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEW YORK BANKER had good early speed inside rivals, shifted out to the four path nearing the turn, closed willingly three wide through the stretch and was along in time under a strong hand ride. MYRRH away alertly, set the pace until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. DARK TEMPTRESS was a forward factor from the start, offered a strong bid along the rail into the stretch then was outfinished. LITTLE BIRD FLASH trailed into the stretch then found his best stride late three wide. TARA DAWN failed to menace. I GOT HOPE was no threat. HEIDI T inside, failed to respond. DONTLOSETHATNUMBER bore out at the start, stalked the pace three deep into the stretch then gave way late.

ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Frank F Romocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, best stride late, 3 wide,

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, angled out 7/16pole, closed willingly, 3w, in time

ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, second best,

ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, outfinished

ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Dontlosethatnumber
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out start, stalked pace 3 wide, gave way lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 14. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REANIMATE battled for the lead three wide then entire trip and wore down rivals in a game effort. BUCKEYE RUCKUS with the second flight three wide, surged in the seven path through deep stretch and just missed. VICTORY DIVISION allowed to settle, found his best stride late in the five path. OFTEN ENOUGH allowed to settle, closed a gap late five wide. MOBIL AT LAST raced widest of all and was steadily gaining ground late in the middle of the racetrack. BOOT LEGGER failed to menace. CAPTAIN RILEY offered a mild bid along the inside into the stretch then came up empty. JUDGE HEAD with the second flight inside, faded in the stretch. THE MAN CAN dueled for the lead between horses two wide then along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. JUST CHESTER matched strides for the lead along the inside into the turn, checked past the five sixteenths pole and dropped out of it.

ENTRY.NAME: Just Chester
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside early, checked mid turn, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Judge Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, faded lane

ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, best stride late 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Boot Legger
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Riley
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: The Man Can
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, between horses, inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Ruckus
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, surged 7path, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Often Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: late gain, 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil At Last
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, closed gap late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Reanimate
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3 wide, wore down rivals, gamely,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 14 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CALTHA stalked the early pace, rallied two wide through the turn to make the lead entering the stretch then widened the balance of the trip while full of run to win going away. SWEET VALERIA close up from the start, has a mild late rally in the tree path and finished second best. TALK DIRTY unhurried early, found her best stride late in the five path. HALOFIED away alertly, set a pressed pace three then two wide through the turn then was outfinished. CAPTIVATING ART failed to menace. RUN AWAY FEVER trailed early, swung wide and passed tiring rivals. TEAM GOLD DIGGER wide early, improved position five wide into the turn then failed to sustain that bid. MOANA'S TALE was no factor. OFFTHEROADAGAIN was a sharp threat along the inside into the turn then was through after a half. GRAY ROYALITY pressed the pace along the inside into the turn, had speed into the stretch and gave way late. FREE TO RUN had brief speed inside.

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, through after half,

ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, gave way late

ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, mild rally 3path, up place

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 2 wide turn, full of run, going away

ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, 3-2wide, outfinished

ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late 5path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 98. Starter Allowance Purse 19900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 14 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances) (Multiple Winners For A Claiming Price Of $8,000 Or More In 2022 - 2023 Preferred)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAISON KARTER prompted the pace two wide into the far turn, assumed command, responded under right handed urging through the stretch and drew off under confident handling. IMPROBABLE STORY vied for the lead three wide and finished second best. COME SEE ABOUT IT away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside into the far turn, had speed into the stretch then weakened. MY BROTHER CAM unhurried early, improved position late in the four path. ZERO GRAVITY passed tiring rivals. BLOOD MOON stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch then gave way. HEMP HEMP HURRAY was through after a half.

ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest Sizemore Eric and Cline Robert C

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace inside, gave way lane

ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace inside 2nd turn, weakened,

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, responded right handed urging, drew off,

ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 14 All owed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEAV'S BOO forwardly placed, closed willingly four wide through the far turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch and drew off under a brisk hand ride. PERFECTINGTHEVIEW stalked the pace into the far turn, dropped back a bit then came on again three wide and finished second best. WINDY LU WHO away alertly, set a pressed pace to the top of the stretch then was outfinished. BLAZING ZENNA never far back, loomed boldly along the rail into the stretch then failed to sustain that bid. INCESSANT pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. SHE'S CRAFTY was no factor. AUNT BEE was no threat. BACKSPLASH was through after a half.
